mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = #{tradeId}

SELECT TS.id AS suggest_id , TS.trade_id , TS.gacha_id , TS.type , TS.status , TS.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , TS.content , TS.created_at , TS.purchase_item_id , GI_P.name AS purchase_item_name , TS.purchase_count , TS.purchase_discount_yn , TS.purchase_discount_price , TS.exchange_seller_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_seller_item_name , TS.exchange_change_yn , TS.exchange_suggested_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_suggested_item_name FROM TRADE_SUGGEST TS LEFT JOIN USER U ON U.id = TS.user_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_P ON GI_P.id = TS.purchase_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TS.exchange_seller_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TS.exchange_suggested_item_id WHERE TS.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND TS.status != 'CANCELED' ORDER BY TS.created_at DESC
SELECT user_id FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = #{tradeId} AND id = #{suggestId}
